title: Zoo York Logo Font?
content:
This should be an easy one. What is the Zoo York logo font?

I have attached a preview.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [zoo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100326143447/http:/typophile.com/files/zoo.jpg) | 12.35 KB |
author: blaketypo

comments.content: It looks like Trade Gothic Bold Condensed No. 20.
